span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 使镇定：to free from agitation: calm
【例】She took a deep breath and composed herself.
【近】contain, settle
【反】agitate, discompose, disquiet, disturb, perturb, upset, vex
【派】composed adj. 镇静的，安定的：free from agitation: calm
【反】distraught, restless 发狂的，不平静的
【派】composure n. 镇定：a calmness or repose especially of mind, bearing, or appearance
【考法 2】 v. 组成，构成：to form the substance of : constitute
【例】composed of many ingredients[ɪn'ɡridɪənt]原料
【近】constitute, comprise, make up
